data.title: University of Colorado Athletics
data.meta_description: RJ Smith (5) Guard - 2022-23 (Freshman): Sat out the season as a redshirt in the Colorado basketball program. High School: A 2022 graduate of Damien High Sch...
data.text:
2022-23 (Freshman): Sat out the season as a redshirt in the Colorado basketball program.

High School: A 2022 graduate of Damien High School. Averaged 15.7 points, 7.0 rebounds and 7.0 assists over his four-year career with the Spartans. He is the schoolâ€™s all-time leader in steals (260) and wins (112) and is second in career rebounds (824) and third in points (1,777). Helped Damien to the 2022 CIF State Division I championship and Baseline League title with a 32-4 record. A four-time All-CIF and Baseline League First Team pick. Named the 2022 Baseline League and San Gabriel Valley Tribune MVP. Selected to the All-CIF State Southern Section First Team. Played two years of club basketball with Prodigy out of Rancho Cucumonga, Calif.

Academics: Majoring in Psychology at Colorado. Was an Honor Roll student at Damien.

Personal: Born Sept. 23, 2003 in Los Angeles, his full name is Randolph Smith, Jr. He is the son of Monica Smith, who played basketball at Cal State Los Angeles. Has four siblings, Jordan, Kennedy, Paris Green and Aleshia Hathaway. Enjoys listening to music, watching movies and playing basketball. Favorite team is the Los Angeles Lakers. He can juggle.
